channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @jeffjarvis I bet they tried to hold the phone companies liable for what people said in conversations.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjarvis I bet they tried to hold the phone companies liable for what people said in conversations.

item.description: Erectile dysfunction medicine should be illegal in states that ban abortion.

item.description: @GuyKawasaki they've lost the constitutional protection everywhere.

item.description:

item.description:
What comedian who's gone now could we use to get us through the ridiculousness of Trump, journalism and the Dems.

I was thinking of Emily Litella.

https://t.co/5cCr3pFwtw

item.description: I'm concerned the Mets might be taking themselves a bit too seriously, unless this is parody in which case -- it's great. This team is rooted in failure. Whose manager asked "Can't anybody here play this game?" https://t.co/e8gQov7V6X

item.description: The Dems should campaign on the idea the shit has hit the fan and it’s time to fight back. Use the words. Stop pretending everything is great. Everyone knows it’s not. You look like idiots if you try to sidestep reality.
item.source:markdown: The Dems should campaign on the idea the shit has hit the fan and it’s time to fight back. Use the words. Stop pretending everything is great. Everyone knows it’s not. You look like idiots if you try to sidestep reality.

item.description:
I hate when they do long interviews on a game I’m watching.

I don’t necessarily watch so I want the play by play.

They’re still doing it.
item.source:markdown:
I hate when they do long interviews on a game I’m watching.
I don’t necessarily watch so I want the play by play.
They’re still doing it.

item.description:
@SilkCharm @berzerkeley >>Can I go to both heavens?

Of course.
item.source:markdown:
@SilkCharm @berzerkeley >>Can I go to both heavens?
Of course.

item.description: I wonder if the Dems can somehow get people to hear that if they give Repubs control of Congress, or even one house, the progress comes to a halt.
item.source:markdown: I wonder if the Dems can somehow get people to hear that if they give Repubs control of Congress, or even one house, the progress comes to a halt.

item.description: @berzerkeley that's what i thought
item.source:markdown: @berzerkeley that's what i thought

item.description:
I don't see how Better Call Saul can have a happy ending for anyone. Almost everyone is already dead, so that rules them out. Is anything remotely like a happy ending available to Jimmy or Kim?

But #BetterCallSaul has to have one of the most creative endings ever considering how crazy creative the show has been up to now.

So if Jimmy is going to die, it's got to be spectacular with lots of angles done by someone who we would never think of. Or maybe Kim kills him, like the end of Mice and Men.

https://t.co/IY6STwr3PK

The thing about Jimmy is that Kim is the only person who really loved him. It seems that if he is to come to his end, it might be with someone who has a kind word for him, because we know down deep he has a good heart.
item.source:markdown:
I don't see how Better Call Saul can have a happy ending for anyone. Almost everyone is already dead, so that rules them out. Is anything remotely like a happy ending available to Jimmy or Kim?
But #BetterCallSaul has to have one of the most creative endings ever considering how crazy creative the show has been up to now.
So if Jimmy is going to die, it's got to be spectacular with lots of angles done by someone who we would never think of. Or maybe Kim kills him, like the end of Mice and Men.
https://t.co/IY6STwr3PK
The thing about Jimmy is that Kim is the only person who really loved him. It seems that if he is to come to his end, it might be with someone who has a kind word for him, because *we* know down deep he has a good heart.

item.description: @berzerkeley i'm sure you do if that's what you want. which heaven are you thinking of?
item.source:markdown: @berzerkeley i'm sure you do if that's what you want. which heaven are you thinking of?
